name: Francium: At the Golden Saucer
description:
"Francium At the Golden Saucer is a comical adventure taking place in a world of robots, in a museum-city that can remind of beautiful villages of France in the old world, before mankind disapeared from the surface of the Earth. In this episode, the Fallen King of Francium, who is a little depressed, is invited to visit the amusement park The Golden Saucer. Things are fun, but will it last for long? ..."

I developed it in 3 weeks from scratch, with a few existing assets (see credits) and all new ones (park, new characters, etc...). The game is quite short (30 minutes) and could contain unknown issues.

Made with 3dsmax, Unity and Adventure Creator.

Gameplay info:

  • Move with keyboard (zqsd or wasd, or arrows)
  • Use or talk with left click.
  • Open or close inventory with right click.
  • Show options menu with Escape.
Not recommended  to use Save system.

If possible, make sure to have an hour before you to play the game all at once without saving.
